frame.name: Visiting_scenario_departing
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> departs from the <fen>Source</fen>, normally bound for their normal location. This is a point-of-view-neutral conception of the departure.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the individual which moves under their own power.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root>Any constituent that expresses the initial position of the <fen>Agent</fen>, before the change of location, is tagged with <fen>Source</fen>. Often the <fen>Source</fen> is understood from context. </def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the trajectory of the departure which is neither a <fen>Source</fen> nor a <fen>Goal</fen> expresses the frame element <fen>Path</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE labels any expression which tells where the <fen>Agent</fen> ends up, or would end up, as a result of departing from the <fen>Source</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any expression which describes a property of motion which is not directly related to the trajectory of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Manner</fen>. Descriptions of steadiness, grace, and many other things count as <fen>Manner</fen> expressions, though <fen>Speed</fen> and <fen>Means</fen> should be tagged using the more specific FE labels. <ex>The messenger <t>left</t> the room <fex name="Manner">clumsily</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The action of the <fen>Agent</fen> which results in their departure.</def-root>

FE.name: Speed
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element labels words or phrases that describe how quickly the <fen>Agent</fen> is moving.</def-root>

FE.name: Mode_of_transportation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Mode_of_transportation</fen> expresses how the motion of the <fen>Agent</fen> is effected, by its body or by a vehicle which holds and conveys the <fen>Agent</fen>. Vehicles can move in any way and in any medium.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the departure takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is the location in which the departing takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> departs from the <fen>Source</fen>.</def-root>
